birthplace.51:55: at the home of a family friend
birthplace.56:63: at the home of a healer or midwife
birthplace.64:65: in a carriage, cart, or wagon
birthplace.66:68: in a barn, shed, or other outbuilding
birthplace.81:82: in a brothel, tavern, or inn
birthplace.83:84: in a castle, keep, tower, or palace
birthplace.85: in a sewer or rubbish heap
birthplace.86:88: among people of a different race
birthplace.89:91: on board a boat or a ship
birthplace.92:93: in a prison or in the headquarters of a secret organization
birthplace.98: on the Astral Plane or the Ethereal Plane

absentParent.5: was imprisoned., enslaved, or taken away.

half-elf.1:5: One parent was an elf and the other was a human.
half-elf.6: One parent was an elf and the other was a half-elf.
half-elf.7: One parent was a human and the other was a half-elf.

half-orc.1:3: One parent was an orc and the other was a human.
half-orc.4:5: One parent was an orc and the other was a half-orc.
half-orc.6:7: One parent was a human and the other was a half-orc.

tiefling.1:4: Both parents were humans, their infernal heritage dormant until you came along.
tiefling.5:6: One parent was a tiefling and the other was a human.
tiefling.7: One parent was a tiefling and the other was a devil.
tiefling.8: One parent was a human and the other was a devil.

causeOfDeath.1: died far away; I do not know how.
causeOfDeath.6:10: died peacefully in bed of old age.
causeOfDeath.15: was killed in by a wild animal.

childhoodHome.31:40: in a small village in the wilderness
childhoodHome.41:50: in an apartment in a rundown neighborhood

childhoodMemories.3: I am still haunted by my childhood, when I was treated badly by my peers.
childhoodMemories.4:5: I spent most of my childhood alone, with no close friends.
childhoodMemories.6:8: Others saw me as being different or strange, and so I had few companions.
childhoodMemories.9:12: I had a few close friends and lived an ordinary childhood.
childhoodMemories.13:15: I had several friends, and my childhood was generally a happy one.
childhoodMemories.16:17: I always found it easy to make friends, and I loved being around people.
childhoodMemories.18: Everyone knew who I was, and I had friends everywhere I went.
